title: K-Pop Officially Becomes the #1 Music Genre Worldwide in 2025
shortdescription: BTS, BLACKPINK, and NewJeans drive K-pop past hip-hop and Latin music in global streams.
description: IFPI's 2025 report confirms K-pop has surpassed hip-hop and Latin music to become the most consumed genre globally, led by fourth-generation groups.
author: Ji-hoon Park

title: Vinyl Sales Hit Highest Level Since 1987 — Thanks to Gen Z
shortdescription: Taylor Swift, Harry Styles, and Olivia Rodrigo drive vinyl revival among 18-24 year olds.
description: 2025 marks the highest vinyl sales in 38 years, with Gen Z leading the analog renaissance through limited edition colored pressings and aesthetic appeal.
image: /images/Vinyl Sales Hit Highest Level Since 1987 — Thanks to Gen Z.webp
author: Alex Rivera

title: Spotify and Apple Music Ban All AI-Generated Tracks in 2025
shortdescription: Major platforms crack down on AI music flooding charts with fake artists and streams.
description: Following abuse of AI-generated tracks reaching Top 50 charts, Spotify, Apple Music, and YouTube Music implement strict detection and removal policies.
image: /images/Spotify and Apple Music Ban All AI-Generated Tracks in 2025.webp
author: Dana Kim
